text: (Ra yasa aghi ‘‘yusupha'alaihis'salama)’’ pani timro pasama pramanaharu li'era a'eka thi'e, tyasama timi sadhaim sanka nai gardathyau. Yahamsam'ma ki jaba unako mrtyu bha'ihalyo, ta timile bhanna lagyau ki allaha uni pachadi kunai (paigambara) sandesta patha'une chaina. Yastai prakarale allahale pratyeka tyasa vyaktila'i margavicalita gara'idincha jo sima ullanghana garnevala (ra) sanka garnevala cha
